prompts: Create a powerful rock-type Pokemon with spikes and an intimidating stance.
Show me a dark-type Pokemon that towers over others with a menacing glare.
Imagine a dual-type Pokemon that thrives in mountainous terrains, with sharp claws and a fierce roar.
Design a Pokemon inspired by dinosaurs, with a massive build and a rugged appearance.
Give me a Pokemon with a green, rugged body and a fierce expression, perfect for battling.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies both strength and resilience, with unique features like sharp spines.
Make a Pokemon that can intimidate its foes with a dark color palette and imposing size.
